EmailTemplate.description: Sent reminding users to sign the contract...
EmailTemplate.name: EU OB: Contract Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Contract
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning {!Contact.FirstName}. You will recall that I contacted you last week regarding the SunPower {!Contract.Contract_Type__c}. The contract was routed to you via EchoSign that day. Please let us know if you have not received a message from EchoSign with the agreement or have had any problems signing.
Thank you for your consideration.
Regards,
Tom Dowley Partner Experience Manager – RLC North America SunPower Corporation 3939 North First Street t 408.457.2335 f 408.240.5400 c 650.575.7095 thomas.dowley@sunpowercorp.com www.sunpowercorp.com
